newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-SUMMARY IN THE SPANISH FIRST DIVISION.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-SUMMARY IN THE SPANISH FIRST DIVISION.

text.p: Summary of Spanish first division match on Monday:
Hercules 3 (Flavio Maestri 57, Marcos Martin, own goal 59, Manuel Alfaro 90) Sevilla 0. Halftime 0-0. Attendance 17,000.
